Oh, THAT one.

::Killfest::

Killfest frowns. "The bridge is probably going to get very violent 
very soon. Are you sure you can handle it there?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (When I said that your instructor couldn't hurt you, or at least not 
> hurt your hands, you will need your hands intact to type with.  The 
> rest of your body can be beat up all you want, but not the hands.)
> 
> DarkMouse::
> She nodded to Killfest. "Is there is nothing else, I'll take my post 
> on the bridge.
